scripts.pages:build: npx next telemetry disable && pnpm next-on-pages
scripts.pages:deploy: npx next telemetry disable && pnpm pages:build && wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static
scripts.pages:watch: npx next telemetry disable && pnpm next-on-pages --watch
scripts.pages:dev: npx next telemetry disable && pnpm wrangler pages dev .vercel/output/static --compatibility-date=2023-10-30 --compatibility-flag=nodejs_compat
